metadata.title: CVE-2018-1160 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Netatalk before 3.1.12 is vulnerable to an out of bounds write indsi_opensess.c. This is due to lack of bounds checking on attackercontrolled data. A remote unauthenticated attacker can leverage thisvulnerability to achieve arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1160` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

netatalk - 3.1.12~ds-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netatalk package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.12~ds-3').
